mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.name,r.value,r.organize,r.enabled FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.deleted = 0 AND r.enabled = 1 ORDER BY r.name

SELECT u.id userId, u.username, ud.`name` person_name, r.id role_id FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_detail ud ON ud.user_id = u.id WHERE r.id = #{roleId} AND r.deleted = 0 AND r.enabled = 1 ORDER BY r.id
